english: Yes , he has engaged in international trade .
Yes , they will be ready in the morning .
chinese: 是的，第二天早晨就擦好了。

english: Yes , they are full of sex and violence .
chinese: 是的，它们充满了性和暴力。

english: Yes , dear , i will write to mother .
chinese: 是的，亲爱的，我要给妈妈写信。

english: Yes , it is . just ring if you want anything .

chinese: 是的造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

chinese: 是的，我失去知觉半个小时。

chinese: 是的，滑水的确非常刺激。

english: Quite true , it made me more hungry .
chinese: 是的，它的香味使我增强食欲。

english: Yes, it was his way of being strong .
chinese: 是的，这是他磨练意志的一种方式。

english: Yes , he is always kind and patient .
chinese: 是的，他总是很亲切，很耐心。

chinese: 是的，他不停用拳头打我，踢我。

chinese: 是的，它从书本上学不到。
